subject: Re: [LH] heard some kate
body:
Adj.  wrote:

> I heard Kate singing The Long and Winding Road in a salon in Mudletta
> Georgia. It was part of an 80's/90's alternative satellite station.

That's pretty strange, as that's only available as an obscure, grainy
bootleg.  Or was that one of the tracks that appeared officially on a
semi-official Japanese fan-club flexidisk?  I wonder how they would have
gotten hold of one of those.

How was the sound quality?

|>oug
